document_data.name: House of the Flying Horse
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the Flying Horse''' was an [[inn]] that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: The inn was located on [[Roguerun Alley]] in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] of Waterdeep.{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.History: The inn was used by smugglers to fence stolen property. Sometime before the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], a [[spell]] duel occurred here between rival [[wizard]]s, destroying the House of the Flying Horse in the process.
